title: Thomas says Supreme Court after leaked draft opinion is 'not the court' of Ginsburg's era - CNN
content:
1. Thomas says Supreme Court after leaked draft opinion is 'not the court' of Ginsburg's era  CNN
  2. Clarence Thomas says 'tremendously bad' abortion draft leak changed the Supreme Court 'forever'  Fox News
  3. Clarence Thomas says abortion leak has changed Supreme Court  New York Post
  4. Opinion | Justice Thomas thinks he's being 'bullied'? He could use a history lesson.  The Washington Post
  5. Pitts: If the Court loses its legitimacy, can its authority be far behind?  Austin American-Statesman
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Justice Clarence Thomas on Friday expressed dismay at the recent leak of a draft Supreme Court opinion that would strike down Roe v. Wade, comparing it to "an infidelity" and saying it has changed the culture of the nation's highest court.
